fullNamePopup: Ce nom doit être celui de la personne qui paie la facture de carte de crédit. Veuillez inclure votre prénom, l’initiale de votre second prénom, et votre nom de famille.
invalidFullName: Include your full name (use a minimum of 2 characters)
invalidAddress: Include your street address (use a minimum of 2 characters)
invalidCity: Include the name of your city (use a minimum of 2 characters)
usCountryNote: Note: The tax receipt will only be valuable to people who earn Canadian income. Why? The receipts are issued by the CHIMP: Charitable Impact Foundation which is a Canadian charity.
